'''Marvelous Sword-Dance (Modified)''' is [[Dori]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
;<big>Constellation Notes</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Sprinkling Weight|Dori gains the following effects for 3s after using [[Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon]]:}}
** {{Color|[[Electro]] [[Elemental Infusion|Infusion]]}}.
** When [[Normal Attack]]s hit opponents, all nearby party members will [[heal]] [[HP]] equivalent to 4% of Dori's Max HP. This type of healing can occur once every 0.1s.
